TDR for UK Shippers

End-to-End Duty Refund Solution for UK Shippers

Unlock hidden savings in your international eCommerce supply chain with our specialized duty and tax recovery services.

A Solution For Each Customs Duty Spend

Order Shipped

The order has left the warehouse to its international buyer.

Order Imported

Order is imported at its final destination and delivered to the buyer.

Customs Duties Are Charged to the Importer

Order Returned

The order was delivered to its US or EU buyer. One or more items are returned.

Claim back US or EU duties with our innovative TDR US Duty Drawback and TDR Europe Duty Drawback services.

Trade Duty Refund claims import duties back.

Order re-imported in the UK

The order is now back to the UK, ready to be processed at the returns warehouse.

Import customs duties are due on returned goods

But TDR Duty-Free Returns to Europe will get your goods back home at 0% Duties.

Discover What's In It For UK Shippers

Reclaim US Import Duty On Exported Goods

TDR Europe Duty Drawback

Make Europe B2C Returns Duty Free

TDR Duty-Free Returns to Europe

Bring Goods Back at 0% Duties
